com.jcabi.github

Class Pull.Smart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcabi.github.Pull.Smart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonPatchable, JsonReadable, Pull, Comparable<Pull>
    Enclosing interface:
    Pull

    @Immutable
@Loggable(value=1)
public static final class Pull.Smart
extends Object
implements Pull
    Smart pull request with extra features.
